title: Robert Mumpkin Myer and the Wish Makers
description: Wishes make worlds... Robert Mumpkin Myer talks to himself, a lot. If someone at the Myer Manor bothered to talk back, perhaps he would not feel so lonely. When a Willie Wagtail lures him up a tree, he is transported to a parallel universe. Nothing is what it seems, and his ordinary life becomes down the rabbit hole extraordinary. Will Robert return unchanged, or will he find the magic laying dormant in his heart since birth?
author: Hayley Merelle
